lyrics.text: Lesson 11 One good turn deserves another.
First listen and then answer the question, Who paid for Tony's dinner?
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题，谁为托尼的晚餐付了钱？

lyrics.text: I was having dinner at a restaurant when Tony Steel came in.
lyrics.translation: 我正在一家餐厅吃饭，这时托尼·斯蒂尔走了进来。

lyrics.text: Tony worked in a lawyer's office years ago, but he is now working at a bank.
lyrics.translation: 托尼几年前在律师事务所工作，但现在他在一家银行工作。

lyrics.text: He gets a good salary, but he always borrows money from his friends and never pays it back.
lyrics.translation: 他薪水不错，但他总是向朋友借钱，而且从不还钱。

lyrics.text: Tony saw me and came and sat at the same table.
lyrics.translation: 托尼看到了我，走过来坐在了同一张桌子旁。

lyrics.text: He has never borrowed money from me.
While he was eating, I asked him to lend me 20 pounds.
lyrics.translation: 当他正在吃饭时，我请他借给我20英镑。

lyrics.text: To my surprise, he gave me the money immediately.
lyrics.translation: 令我惊讶的是，他立刻给了我钱。

lyrics.text: I have never borrowed any money from you.
lyrics.translation: 我从来没有向你借过钱。

lyrics.text: Tony said, So now you can pay for my dinner.
lyrics.translation: 托尼说：“所以现在你可以为我支付晚餐的费用了。”
